title: Manohari Peacock Haaram with Coral Dangles
materials: Ruby. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning short Haaram features a meticulously crafted peacock motif pendant, symbolizing beauty and grace. Adorned with sparkling CZ diamonds, delicate emerald and ruby accents, and finished with coral bead dangles. The intricate gold chain showcases a floral pattern adding to its exquisite detail. A classic temple jewelry inspired design element combines tradition with elegance.
occasions: and special occasions. A cherished addition to your heirloom jewelry collection
ideal for muhurtham ceremonies and half-saree functions (లంగవోణి వేడుక). Can also be styled with contemporary outfits for a touch of ethnic flair.
description: A testament to superior craftsmanship, this haaram beautifully blends traditional South Indian motifs with modern elegance. The vibrant coral beads provide a pop of color and are believed to bring good luck. The high-quality CZ diamonds offer the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price. Durable and timeless, this piece is a valuable investment that can be passed down through generations.
